name: seditiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is intended to persuade other people to oppose their government: The protesters were charged with conspiring seditiously with the enemy. I never saw him act improperly or seditiously at any time.
More examplesFewer examplesI was accused of preaching seditiously against the government.He was imprisoned for ten years for seditiously conspiring to cause dissent.The defendants were charged with illegally and seditiously encouraging people to protest.They were seditiously planning to overthrow the government.
